main event: A civilian observed an unusual bright, circular light in the sky near Covington, Indiana on November 6, 1967 around 7:00 PM EST.
interesting points: The light appeared to be hovering or slowly moving back and forth in the sky.
The light suddenly accelerated and moved rapidly out of sight to the northwest.
The entire sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes.
The witness was a licensed private pilot and was familiar with all conventional aircraft, but stated this light did not resemble any known aircraft.
The light appeared to be self-luminous and much brighter than any normal aircraft lights.
sighted object: a bright, circular light in the sky
